global.description: Configure of auto save checkpoint switch.

auto-save.description: Configure of enable auto save checkpoint.

enable.description: Enable/disable auto save checkpoint when upgrade software package.

versions.description: List of operational state of software package versions. The node versions is deprecated. You are advised to use the node /system/system-info.

version.description: Operational state of a software package version. The node version is deprecated. You are advised to use the node /system/system-info.

base.description: Current software package version. The node base is deprecated. You are advised to use the node /system/system-info/product-version.

patch.description: Current patch package version. The node patch is deprecated. You are advised to use the node /system/system-info/patch-version.

startup-packages.description: List of operational state of startup software packages.

startup-package.description: Operational state of startup software package.

current-package.description: The name of a software package used at the current startup.

next-package.description: The name of a software package used at the next startup.

items.description: Operational data of the feature software packages used at the current startup. Name of the files that end with ccx.
Operational data of the feature software packages used at the next startup. Name of the files that end with ccx.

packages.description: List of operational state of software packages on the device.

package.description: Operational state of a software package on the device.

name.description: The file name of a software package on the device, which can be modified by users.

software-name.description: The software name of the software package file, which is published with package and can not be modified.

package-type.description: The type of a software package on the device.

version.description: Specify the version of a feature software package.

items.description: Operational data of the feature package name of a software package. Such as URL/Macsec, etc.

upgrade-rollback-timer.description: Operational data of upgrade rollback timer.

timer-enable.description: When the rollback timer is closed, the time leaf will not be shown.

operation-schedules.description: List of operational state of software packages.

fail-reason.description: Cause of the software operation failure.

integrated-infos.description: List of software packages on the device.

integrated-info.description: Operational data of a software package on the device.

name.description: Specify the name of a software package on the device.

package-integrated-version.description: Specify the integrated version of a software package on the device.

component-status.description: Specify the component status of a software package on the device.

component-version.description: Specify the component version of a software package on the device.

startup-features.description: List of startup feature software package versions.

startup-feature.description: Operational data of a startup feature software package version information.

feature-name.description: Specify the feature name of a feature software package used at the current startup.

location.description: Specify the file name of a feature software package used at the current startup.

status.description: Specify the feature package is active or inactive.

version.description: Specify the software version of a feature software package used at the current startup.

activated-time.description: Specify the software installation time of a feature software package used at the current startup.
